column4: Hello! I have a problem booting ubuntu 10.4 live cd & usb. During the boot I have no screen anymore after the startup menu of the ubuntu live cd. Can someone help me with this problem?
Hello! I have a problem booting ubuntu 10.4 live cd & usb. During the boot I have no screen anymore after the startup menu of the ubuntu live cd. Can someone help me with this problem?
what is the last thing you see when booting?
a cursor flickering in the left top corner
is there any pci card, maybe pci wifi in?
also is it a laptop or a PC?
I have pci and wifi.
so the wifi is usb?
it's intergrated with the motherboard. but the wifi is diabled in the bios
which motherboard is it please
ASUS P5K Deluxe/WiFi-AP
with nvidia 9600gt and soundblaster audigy se
try booting with nomodeset
when you get the first screen there press enter select english then press F6 press spaebar on nomodeset press escape and then 'try ubuntu without installing'
thanks for your advise. I'm going to try it. hopefully I will be back in half an hour on u10.4
yes but thanks anyway :)
I see now ubuntu loading. but when the five dots are red colored the system hangs. flickering the scroll and caps lock
did karmic work fine?
I see now ubuntu loading. but when the five dots are red colored the system hangs. flickering the scroll and caps lock
did ubuntu 9.10 worked on this very same system?
I tried x32 and x64 now but still the same problems. do you have any solutions?
try karmic
